title: Modern Apartment with City View
description: A modern apartment offering stunning city views. Ideal for urban living. This apartment includes 2 bedrooms, a spacious living room, a well-equipped kitchen, and a stylish bathroom.

title: Spacious Family House
description: A spacious family house, perfect for comfortable and peaceful living. This house features 4 bedrooms, a large living area, a fully-equipped kitchen, multiple bathrooms, and a beautiful garden.

title: Modern Apartment in Suburbia
description: A modern apartment located in a suburban area, combining comfort and convenience. This apartment includes 3 bedrooms, a modern kitchen, a spacious living room, and 2 bathrooms.

title: Spacious House with Garden
location: 160 Visa Park, Hazi Ali Road, Chittagong
description: A spacious house featuring a beautiful garden, offering a tranquil living environment. This house has 5 bedrooms, a well-appointed kitchen, a large living area, and 3 bathrooms.

title: Cozy Studio near Downtown
description: A cozy studio apartment located near downtown, perfect for urban living. This studio includes a bedroom, a small kitchenette, and a private bathroom.

title: Luxury Duplex with Garden
description: A luxury duplex featuring a beautiful garden, offering a sophisticated lifestyle. This duplex includes 4 bedrooms, a modern kitchen, a spacious living area, and 3 bathrooms.

title: Private Room in Shared House
description: A private room available in a shared house, suitable for individuals seeking a cozy living space. The room includes a comfortable bed, a study desk, and access to shared kitchen and bathroom facilities.

title: Cozy Room in Shared House
description: A cozy room within a shared house, providing a comfortable and affordable living option. The room comes with essential furnishings and access to shared kitchen and bathroom facilities.
